bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
We can't use the D-Bus interface because python3-slip-dbus is not installed:
-bash-4.3# /usr/share/atomic/atomic_dbus.py Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/share/atomic/atomic_dbus.py", line 10, in <module> import slip.dbus.service ImportError: No module named 'slip'
Seems like we need a Requires on %{pypkg}-slip-dbus.
Lokesh can you add this dependency?
